title: Apple Vision Pro 2: Cheaper Model Coming 2026 With M5 Chip & No External Display
shortdescription: Apple just fast-tracked a $1,999 Vision Pro – full leak of specs and release timeline.
author: Tech Expert

content.content: Ming-Chi Kuo and Mark Gurman just confirmed: Apple has greenlit a cheaper Vision Pro 2 launching late 2026 priced at $1,999 — almost half the original.

Key changes: M5 chip, lighter titanium frame, no external EyeSight display (to cut costs), improved passthrough cameras, and a new magnetic battery pack. Apple reportedly wants to sell 5 million units in the first year.
